page.title: 07KINGSWINFORD HEALTH CENTRE
page.content: {The Health Centre}was built in{1975}on the corner of Standhills Road and High Street.It helps everybody in this area, from OAPs to babies.At least 14,000 people visit the Centre because of all the services it provides, such as Doctors, Dentists, Health Visitors, Speech Therapists, Opticians and Chiropodists.In all, about 30 people work at the Centre. Some of these people make frequent visits to patients' homes,particularly to the very young and very old. {Health}in this area is improving. One reason is that the Health Centre is convenient for many people and secondly there is no pollution because there are few factories in the area. Also there is less smoking and more open space.Today in Kingswinford the most serious illness for adults is {heart disease}& for children{measles.}
